<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_ux_my_list</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Insert Order</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ux_my_list'); gr.addEncodedQuery('sys_created_by=javascript:gs.getUserName()^active=true^ORDERBYDESCorder'); gr.query();
if (gr.next()) { current.order = parseInt(gr.getValue('order'), 10) + 10; } else { current.order = 10; }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-04 22:48:21</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>3629ae4073511010a0a79329faf6a76d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Insert Order</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="@servicenow/now-record-list-menu-connected" source="sn_rec_list_menu_c">3db8027898a93973f08538e42f091589</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="@servicenow/now-record-list-menu-connected">3db8027898a93973f08538e42f091589</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_3629ae4073511010a0a79329faf6a76d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-09 22:48:21</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3629ae4073511010a0a79329faf6a76d"/> </record_update>
